Name: Wooden shield
Description: A simple wooden shield, better than nothing.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Un simple escudo de madera, mejor que nada.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 단순한 나무 방패, 아무것도없는 것보다 낫습니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Ein einfacher Holzschild, besser als nichts.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Un simple bouclier en bois, mieux que rien.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Egyszerű fa pajzs, jobb, mint a semmi.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Un semplice scudo di legno, meglio di niente.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: シンプルな木製の盾、何もないよりはまし。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Um escudo simples de madeira, melhor do que nada.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Простой деревянный щит, лучше, чем ничего.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Hiç yoktan iyidir, basit bir tahta kalkan.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 一个简单的木盾，总比没有好。
